import React from 'react'; import DashBoardLayOut from '../../layouts/DashboardLayOut'; import httpHelper from '../../helpers/httpHelper'; import PersonalDetailsForm from "../../components/personalDetailsForm" import BankDetailsForm from "../../components/bankDetailsForm" import SingleFarm from '../../components/singleFarm'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import $ from 'jquery'; import Router from "next/router"; class investments extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.handlePersonalDetailsChange = this.handlePersonalDetailsChange.bind(this); this.state = {userDetails:"",userName:""}; } static async getInitialProps({ req }) { return {}; } handlePersonalDetailsChange(data){ this.setState({userName:data.name}); } componentDidMount() { httpHelper.serverReq("http://localhost:3009/api/v1/user").then((response)=>{ if (response.success){ let bank_acct_number = response.success.data.bank_acct_number; let regex = /^(\d{3})(\d{4,})(\d*)/; let parsed = String(response.success.data.bank_acct_number).replace(regex,"$1****$3"); this.setState({userDetails:response.success.data,userName:response.success.data.name,bank_acct_name:response.success.data.bank_acct_name,bank_acct_number:parsed}) } }) } render() { return(

Profile - {this.state.userName}

Personal Details

E-mail

{this.state.userDetails.email}

Password

*********

Phone No.

{this.state.userDetails.phone_number?this.state.userDetails.phone_number:"Not Available"}

Address

{this.state.userDetails.address?this.state.userDetails.address:"Not Available"}

Bank Name

{this.state.bank||"Not Available"}

Bank Account Name

{this.state.bank_acct_name||"Not Available"}

Bank Account Number

{this.state.bank_acct_number||"Not Available"}

) } } export default investments;
